metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6378 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A serialization vulnerability in logback receiver component part oflogback version 1.4.11 allows an attacker to mount a Denial-Of-Serviceattack by sending poisoned data.

criterions.comment: logback: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
